title: Land for Sale in Mahara Kadawatha
details:
28 perch of valuable land suitable for Residential or Commercial

Facing Colombo Kandy Road and within close proximity to popular schools, Super Markets, Walking path,

Its within 2 km radius to both Kadawatha & Kiribathgoda town

Solid House consisting 4 Bedrooms and 3 Bath Rooms, Dining room, Living area, 4 Car Parking
Value is for the land only

It has large garden with a fully grown Coconuts trees, Mango, Jack fruit with neatly grown grass that makes a property an eye catcher, ideal for garden parties

Total Price 75.6 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
